channel.title: Review on 渡邉充哉
channel.description: Recent content in Review on 渡邉充哉

item.description: Excellence in Reviewing Heliyon誌における学術論文の査読が"Excellence in Reviewing"を受けました。 Certificate of Excellence in Reviewing presented to ATSUYA WATANABE in recognition of the excellent quality of peer review contributed to the journal.
